column1: Kata Robata////The sashimi here is amazing! Well with the price and will go back for just that. However the rolls and other menu items we had were just lacking
column2: either for what you paid for vs portion size or in taste.  Loved the Kobe beef bites but it's small and only 4 small bites.  The lobster Mac and cheese wasn't my favorite at all.  Anyway go for the sashimi
column3: just don't get caught up in the rest of the menu!
